alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, northern Miami-Dade and Broward Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miccosukee Service Plaza, or 32 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Big Cypress National Preserve and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County
